tafsirQuiz.question: What is the main message of Surah Al-Waqia, Ayah 1?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: But the formation of the ‘other world’ is just as possible as the formation of the present world. In the present world, man observes that he is free to do whatever he likes
distractors: This verse describes the creation of mankind
This verse is about the battles of early Muslims
This verse talks about the Day of Judgment only

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Waqia, Ayah 8?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: According to the Prophet’s wife, ‘A’ishah, the Prophet said, ‘Do you know, on the Day of Judgement, who will be the first to find a place in the protective shade of God
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: However, they were sincere about God and His Prophet, and they maintained themselves on the path of justice and went in fear of God throughout their lives
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Deceived by the amenities they had in this world, they had made things other than God the centre of their attention, and this is the greatest human crime
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Waqia, Ayah 42?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Man should be grateful to God for all the blessings He has showered upon him. The birth of a human being from the womb of his mother, the growing of crops from the earth, the falling of rain, the availability of fire from fuel—all these things come directly from God
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: Which important teaching is conveyed in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Had this natural arrangement not been in place, all of the water in the world would have been brackish just like sea water. For one who ponders over these events, there are countless lessons
distractors: This verse narrates a historical event
This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers

tafsirQuiz.question: According to the tafsir, what should we understand from this verse?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Here, the mawaqi of stars probably means the orbits of stars. They are revolving in their respective orbits with extreme precision
distractors: This verse only discusses worldly matters
This verse addresses only legal rulings
This verse is primarily about historical events

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: A person who gives serious consideration to this system functioning in space, will be compelled to admit that the Creator of this universe is unimaginably Mighty
distractors: This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: However, those who shunned God in this world will be denied God’s grace in the Hereafter. Those who performed deeds deserving of paradise in their life before death, will be ushered into paradise in the life after death
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
